items.sentence: Tom was only thirteen when he came to Boston.
Tom was probably the last one to fall asleep.
Have you ever made a speech in French before?
Have you ever played tennis with your father?
Tom is being a bit self-indulgent, isn\'t he?
Tom is busy right now and he can\'t help you.
Tom will never willingly go there by himself.
Tom crosses this bridge at least once a week.
Tom definitely overestimates his own ability.
I used to watch TV three or four hours a day.
I used to work in the same restaurant as Tom.
You don\'t know how much I wanted to do that.
You don\'t want to get me in trouble, do you?
The three of us spend a lot of time together.
Tom caught a couple of large trout yesterday.
It\'s time for us to do something about that.
The clothes Tom wears are made by his mother.
Tom saw Mary picking things up off the floor.
Tom says Mary has been a bad influence on me.
Tom tried to flush the drugs down the toilet.
Tom found out that his phone had been tapped.
Tom has a modest two-bedroom house in Boston.
I use the knife that you gave me quite often.
It was cloudy, so I took an umbrella with me.
The picnic area is easily accessible by road.
We want to hire someone who can speak French.
I had no idea Tom couldn\'t speak any French.
Wasn\'t there anything they could do for you?
Tom said he didn\'t want to do that with you.
Tom said he didn\'t want to take any chances.
I appreciate the thoroughness of your report.
Tom\'s worth about a hundred million dollars.
What are some good ways to keep from snoring?
Tom wasn\'t able to buy everything he needed.
Tom wasn\'t as angry as I expected him to be.
I wonder if Tom is able to understand French.
I wonder if Tom is going to Boston next week.
Are you ever going to wear these boots again?
Are you going to wear a costume to the party?
Are you really going to ask Mary to the prom?
Are you really serious about going to Boston?
Tom doesn\'t know what he\'d do without Mary.
Do you really think that Tom is in Australia?
Do you still have the guitar that I gave you?
Mary is three years younger than her husband.
Tom doesn\'t have many things to worry about.
You\'ve been thinking about me, haven\'t you?
I\'m sure that Tom will pass the examination.
Tom doesn\'t know what it\'s like to be poor.
Will you have a Christmas party at your home?
